      • open_connection

        public void open_connection(java.lang.String url,
                   java.lang.String user,
                   java.lang.String password)
        \brief Opens a connection to the specified MySQL server.
        Parameters:
        url - MySQL server address, example: "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/testdb".
        user - User to connect to the server as.
        password - Password for the specified user.
